description: Officials in northern Mexico say nine people were killed and more than 120 injured when strong winds caused a stage to collapse at a political event. In Texas, a reported tornado ripped through a town north of Austin, causing widespread destruction a day after five people were killed by severe storms in Iowa. NBC News' Maggie Vespa reports.
title: Relentless, deadly severe weather hits the U.S. and Mexico

description: Companies continue to push the sale of hair relaxers in Africa, despite studies that link the ingredients with cancer. NBC News’ Zinhle Essamauh explains how companies are evading regulations and the impact on women who have used the products.
title: Companies push sale of hair relaxers despite links to cancer-causing ingredients

description: NBC News filmed the distressing scenes as dead and wounded children were brought to a hospital in Gaza after an Israeli airstrike hit displaced civilians sheltering in a school.
title: Palestinian children killed in Israeli airstrike on Gaza City school

description: Xóchitl Gálvez overcame adversity and achieved success, but people in Tepatepec support President López Obrador's social policies, espoused by Gálvez's rival, Claudia Sheinbaum.
title: She trails the ruling party's candidate to be Mexico's president. Visiting her hometown helps show why.

description: A deputy chief of the Russian military general staff has been arrested on charges of large-scale bribery, Russian news reports said Thursday.
title: Deputy Russian military chief of staff jailed for bribery in latest arrest of high defense official

description: At least nine people were killed, including one child, and dozens were injured when a stage structure collapsed at political campaign rally in Mexico on Wednesday night.
title: Many dead and injured after strong winds bring down stage at campaign rally in Mexico

description: China's military held air, sea and land drills surrounding Taiwan in what it called punishment for separatist forces seeking independence on the self-governed island.
title: China holds military drills around Taiwan as 'powerful punishment'
